column1: Local Foods////I'm a HUGE fan of Benji's crunchy chicken dish
column2: so turning it into a sandwich on a pretzel bun for lunch is a HUGE plus for me! My sides were the Tuscan kale and homemade chips. Both delish. My hubby ordered the Gulf Shrimp and Blue Crab sandwich. To me
column4: but he enjoyed it. The wild rice side was rather bland and dry. "Mintade" is a must get! .... and the carrot cupcake was super moist
